RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Booker T Washington School for the Performing Arts
Girl Scouts of San Jacinto Council

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Four of the Thompson & Knight Foundation bacame members of the board of directors for the Holland & Knight Charitable Foundation upon transfer of the Thompson & Knight Foundation transfer of funds.

Thompson & Knight LLP was acquired by Holland & Knight LLP in 2021. Once the acquisition was completed the Thompson & Knight Foundation board of directors voted to transfer the remaining fund balances to the Holland & Knight Charitable Foundation. Four of the Thompson & Knight Foundation board members were elected to the Holland & Knight Charitable Foundation board of drictors.
The board of directors of the foundation are members in the law firm Thompson & Knight LLP
Form 990 is provided to the Foundation Chair for review and comments prior to filing.
The foundation's governing documents and financial statements are available to the public upon request.
